title: lint mjs => TypeError: Key "plugins": Cannot redefine plugin "n".

labels.name: accepted
labels.description: There is consensus among the team that this change meets the criteria for inclusion

labels.name: archived due to age
labels.description: This issue has been archived; please open a new issue for any further discussion

body:
### Environment

Node version: v18.8.0
npm version: v8.19.1
Local ESLint version: v8.23.0 (Currently used)
Global ESLint version: Not found
Operating System: darwin 22.1.0

### What parser are you using?

Default (Espree)

### What did you do?

added an empty file "t.mjs" in the eslint codebase, and running `npx eslint t.mjs`. it throws an error:

```bash
âžœ  eslint git:(42bfbd7b7) npx eslint t.mjs

Oops! Something went wrong! :(

ESLint: 8.23.0

TypeError: Key "plugins": Cannot redefine plugin "n".
    at ObjectSchema.merge (/Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/lib/config/flat-config-schema.js:272:23)
    at /Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/node_modules/@humanwhocodes/object-schema/src/object-schema.js:176:54
    at Array.reduce (<anonymous>)
    at ObjectSchema.merge (/Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/node_modules/@humanwhocodes/object-schema/src/object-schema.js:169:24)
    at /Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/node_modules/@humanwhocodes/config-array/api.js:739:41
    at Array.reduce (<anonymous>)
    at FlatConfigArray.getConfig (/Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/node_modules/@humanwhocodes/config-array/api.js:738:32)
    at FlatConfigArray.isIgnored (/Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/node_modules/@humanwhocodes/config-array/api.js:755:14)
    at /Users/weiran/repo/github/eslint/lib/eslint/eslint-helpers.js:144:38
    at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
```

### What did you expect to happen?

lint susscessfully.

### What actually happened?

the error happened.

### Participation

- [ ] I am willing to submit a pull request for this issue.

### Additional comments

it was firstly reported in https://github.com/weiran-zsd/eslint-plugin-node/pull/51#issuecomment-1234232548.
